name: Pai
fun_fact: Fun fact: The road from Chiang Mai to Pai has 762 curves in just 130km - it's so winding that motion sickness pills are sold at the bus station, and the curvy route has become a legendary motorcycle ride for adventurous travelers!

hero_dishes.name: Khao Soi
hero_dishes.description: Northern Thai curry noodle soup with coconut milk, crispy noodles on top, and pickled mustard greens
hero_dishes.origin_story: A Burmese-influenced specialty of Northern Thailand - creamy, spicy, and topped with crispy egg noodles. The pickled greens cut the richness
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Witching Well, Charlie & Lek, local restaurants throughout Pai

hero_dishes.name: Pad Thai
hero_dishes.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tamarind, egg, peanuts, and fresh lime
hero_dishes.origin_story: Available everywhere, often made fresh at the Walking Street night market
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Walking Street night market, Baan Benjarong, street vendors

hero_dishes.name: Mango Sticky Rice
hero_dishes.description: Sweet glutinous rice with fresh mango and coconut cream
hero_dishes.origin_story: Thailand's beloved dessert - Pai's relaxed vibe makes this the perfect afternoon treat
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Night market vendors, caf√©s throughout town

hero_dishes.name: Vegetarian Options
hero_dishes.description: Pai has exceptional vegetarian food due to its hippie/wellness culture
hero_dishes.origin_story: The town's yoga and wellness scene has created excellent meat-free options
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Earth Tone, Om Garden Caf√©, numerous vegetarian restaurants

signature_drinks.name: Thai Iced Coffee
signature_drinks.description: Strong coffee with sweetened condensed milk poured over ice
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Essential morning fuel - order at any caf√©

signature_drinks.name: Fresh Fruit Shakes
signature_drinks.description: Blended tropical fruit smoothies available everywhere
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: The perfect refresher in Pai's heat - mango, papaya, dragon fruit, passion fruit

food_culture_notes: Walking Street night market is the heart of Pai's food scene
Hippie/backpacker culture means lots of Western fusion and vegetarian options
Pai Canyon and waterfalls are easy day trips between meals
Everything is super cheap - full meals for $2-4
